meanings.definition: A very short period of time.
meanings.sent1: I'll be back in a jiffy.
meanings.sent2: She finished her homework in a jiffy.
meanings.sent3: He ran to the store and back in a jiffy.
meanings.sent4: The cat caught the mouse in a jiffy.
meanings.sent5: The lightning struck in a jiffy, startling everyone.
